thread.title: Three Canadian cities favourite destinations among US touristsTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Three Canadian cities favourite destinations among US touristsTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Three Canadian cities favourite destinations among US tourists Published on : Sunday, August 30, 2015
In the first half of this year Canada has been a popular destination among American travellers, with three major urban Canadian centers cracking a top 10 list of international destinations for U.S. tourists.
The top three most popular international destinations remain unchanged from 2014 in the list compiled by online booking site Hotels.com with London, Paris and Rome leading the pack.
Rounding out the list are Toronto, Vancouver and Montreal, in fourth, fifth and sixth spots respectively, shoving other cities like Barcelona, Tokyo and Hong Kong further down the list.
The ranking of top 50 destinations also included newcomers such as Budapest and Ciudad Juarez in Mexico.
The top 10 international destinations among U.S. travellers so far in 2015 are:
1. London
2. Paris
3. Rome
4. Toronto
5. Vancouver
6. Montreal
7. Barcelona
8. Tokyo
9. Hong Kong
10.Amsterdam
